description: The NANDA-I classification is a set of nursing diagnoses developed by the NANDA International. This purpose of the terminology is to provide nursing diagnoses used to describe patientsâ€™ responses to actual or potential health problems and life processes responses to diseases rather than classifying the conditions of diseases and disorders.
